Isobu (or Yagura while [[Jinchūriki Forms|fully transformed]] into Isobu) can roll into a ball and bulldoze its opponents, making full use of its many spiky protrusions in a manner similar to the [[Akimichi clan]]'s Spiked Human Bullet Tank. This manoeuvre can also be used to escape attacks.
